text: John Doyle Ong (born September 29, 1933) is an American business executive and politician. He was the United States Ambassador to Norway from 2002 to 2005 during the George W. Bush presidency. Ong was born in Uhrichsville, Ohio. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:Ambassadors of the United States to Norway Category:Politicians from Ohio Category:Businesspeople from Ohio Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: John D. Ong
